Rowdy Wolf:




Rowdy Wolf saw Zyber slowly approaching in the distance. He picked his head 
up and erected his ears. He gave the air a few sniffs, checking on Zyber's 
chemicals that were sometimes present. He had to check for a hidden 
agression or fear, since her head was ducked. He still had to be cautious.

He turned his ears to the side of his head.
